description:
A game launcher with its own embedded BitTorrent client.

Hydra is a Game Launcher with its own embedded BitTorrent Client. The launcher is written in TypeScript (Electron) and Python, which handles the torrenting system by using libtorrent.
- Fixes French translation on not showing game playtime on game page.
- Linux: Fixes games without wine prefix not synchronizing achievements on start up when user has Hydra Cloud.
- Removes silent auto update as it was causing some issues.
